text: Gaa dae loo gi di tama gu mada madua, gei mee gaa lahi a mee gi tama ahina di king gii hai dana dama, gei tama ahina gaa gahi di ingoo o maa bolo Moses,2.10 Moses: Di lee o di ingoo deenei i nnelekai Hebrew le e hai gadoo be di helekai “daa gi daha” 2.10 Nnegau 7.21 ga helekai boloo, “I mee dela ne daa ko au gi daha mo nia wai.”
